response:

1. Alice is offering me $400,000 (40%) of the $1,000,000

A 40% share right now ($400,000) is better than risking a lower effective value in the next round. Even if I managed to get 50% in the next round, that would only be $450,000 before inflation, and $405,000 after the 10% inflation - not much better than the current offer.
